name: SFENCE
short_description:
The SFENCE dynamic library is an interface for developing software. A program code which uses the SFENCE correctly is independent of platform, GUI and SFENCE extension modules (usually without SSEM module).

Big part of the SFENCE functionality is based on SFENCE extension modules (SEM).
summary: The SFENCE dynamic library is an interface for writing programs.
